body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Go over all dynamic configs and see if possible to make it truly dynamic (no restart required)

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Decrease the number of dynamic config which is not truly dynamic.
Ref: #1757

comments.body: This is case by case. We have since changed many configs to be truly dynamic and not require restarts.

title: Go over all dynamic configs and see if possible to make it truly dynamic (no restart required)
